item.title: Unmarshal
item.description: Do not rely on the fact that go unmarshaled json without error into your type - it may just have ignored all the json and instantiated an empty variable.

item.title: git add `--edit`
item.description: TIL that I can use git add --edit during an interactive rebase to do things like move a file from a go package (created in that commit) to an existing package; this reduces the scope of the regex substitution to avoid changing unrelated code.
